alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 6:43PM CDT until May 30 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... Southeastern Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Southeastern Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 642 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nebish to near Lake George, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bemidji, Blackduck, Plantagenet Lake, Lake George, Wilton, Tenstrike and Lavinia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
